wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.title: WFRP4e - Prone at Zero Wounds
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.description: Automatically handles Prone at 0 Wounds and Unconscious after Toughness Bonus rounds, with options for chat buttons or automatic application.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.enable: If disabled, this module will not react when Actors reach 0 Wounds.
If enabled, the module will react when Player Characters reach 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcReci: Who should receive chat messages related to Player Characters reaching 0 Wounds or falling Unconscious?
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.enable: If enabled, the module will react when NPCs or creatures reach 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcRec: Who should receive chat messages related to NPCs or creatures reaching 0 Wounds or falling Unconscious?
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.proneM: Choose whether applying Prone at 0 Wounds is disabled, requires a chat button, or is applied automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.proneA: If enabled, when Prone is applied automatically, a chat message is sent to the same recipients that would receive the chat button.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.uncons: Choose whether falling Unconscious after remaining at 0 Wounds for a number of combat rounds equal to Toughness Bonus is disabled, requires a chat button, or is applied automatically.
If enabled, when Unconscious is applied automatically, a chat message is sent to the same recipients that would receive the chat button.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.unconsciou: {actorName} has remained at 0 Wounds for too long (TB {tb}) and falls
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.notifications.a: Unable to find the Actor to apply the condition.

wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.notifications.e: Error while applying the condition. Check the console.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.wake: {actorName} is no longer at 0 Wounds and may remove
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.wakeMo: When a character at 0 Wounds and Unconscious is healed to at least 1 Wound, choose how to handle the removal of the Unconscious condition.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.wakeAu: If enabled, a chat message is sent when Unconscious is removed automatically.
